Name: Fuel Capacity
Affects: Number of jumps in a full tank

Name: Manufacturing
Description: The manufacturing and production capabilities of the freighter.
Affects: Number of manufacturing bay machine slots

Name: Navigation
Description: The Navigation system makes it possible to plot a safe path for Hyperjumping to moving objects.
Affects: Maximum jump range to asteroids and empty space

Name: Scanner
Description: The scanner allows you to detect asteroid types and informs about the resources they may contain.

Name: Shuttle Forge
Description: Add a forge to your shuttle that produces molten iron that can be used for construction of infrastructure on the asteroid surface.

Name: Shuttle Equipment
Description: The equipment carrying capacity of the shuttle that makes space for Workerbots and Mining Turrets to the asteroid surface

Name: Shuttle Storage
Affects: Storage capacity of the shuttle while in flight

Name: Shuttle Delivery
Description: Capability to issue delivery orders for Workerbots to bring turrets into the field
